item.title: House GOP targets another Dem official accused of blocking ICE amid Delaney Hall fallout
item.description: Tennessee Rep. Andy Ogles wrote a letter formally requesting an investigation of Nashville Mayor Freddie O'Connell.

item.title: Trump embraces Dem policies traditionally rejected by GOP in bid to build 'party of common sense'
item.description: President Donald Trump's policies, including drug price controls and tax reforms, reflect a blend of Republican and Democratic ideas.
